message.name: ERR_RNFE_RULE_SET
message.locale: Rule set '%1s' not found.

message.name: INF_RECALCULATING
message.locale: Recalculating: %1s

message.name: INF_QUEUING_RECALCULATION_AFTER_CURRENT_CALCULATIONS
message.locale: Queuing for recalculation after current calculations have completed: %1s

message.name: INF_DEFERRED_RECALCULATION
message.locale: Queuing for deferred recalculation: %1s

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_DETECTED
message.locale: Database %1s detected on table '%2s':

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_PROCESSED
message.locale: Propagation completed for database %1s detected on table '%2s':

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_PASSED_TO_PROPAGATOR
message.locale: Database %1s on table '%2s' will be passed to registered propagator type '%3c':

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_SKIPPED_BY_PROPAGATOR
message.locale: Registered propagator type '%3c' has chosen to skip database %1s on table '%2s':

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_PROCESSING_BY_PROPAGATOR
message.locale: Registered propagator type '%3c' will process database %1s on table '%2s':

message.name: INF_DATABASE_WRITE_PROCESSED_BY_PROPAGATOR
message.locale: Registered propagator type '%3c' has successfully completed the processing of database %1s on table '%2s':

message.name: INF_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_CHANGED
message.locale: - Attribute value changed: attribute '%1s' on rule object with ID %2n changed from value '%3s' to value '%4s'.

message.name: INF_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_SET
message.locale: - Attribute value set: attribute '%1s' on rule object with ID %2n set to value '%3s'.

message.name: INF_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_UNCHANGED
message.locale: - Attribute value unchanged: attribute '%1s' on rule object with ID %2n continues to have value '%3s'.

message.name: INF_RULE_CLASS_PROCESSING
message.locale: Propagating to rule class '%1s'...

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECT_CREATED
message.locale: New rule object created for rule class '%1s' with ID %2n:

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECT_REMOVING
message.locale: Removing rule object for rule class '%1s' with ID %2n, with specified values:

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECT_UPDATING
message.locale: Updating rule object for rule class '%1s' with ID %2n.:

message.name: INF_KEY_STRUCT_FIELDS_HEADER
message.locale: with key struct fields:

message.name: INF_DTLS_STRUCT_FIELDS_HEADER
message.locale: with details struct fields:

message.name: INF_DERIVIATION_OVERRIDDEN_BY_PROPAGATED_VALUE
message.locale: The value of '%1s' on rule object with ID %2n overrides a derivation expression.

message.name: INF_DESCRIPTION_ATTRIBUTE_PROPAGATION_SKIPPED
message.locale: The propagation of the 'description' attribute on rule object with ID %1n was skipped.

message.name: INF_FULL_PROPAGATION_PROCESSING
message.locale: Starting full propagation for registered propagator type '%1c'...

message.name: INF_FULL_PROPAGATION_PROCESSED
message.locale: Completed full propagation for registered propagator type '%1c'.

message.name: INF_FULL_PROPAGATION_SUMMARY
message.locale: Full Propagation Summary:

message.name: INF_CONSISTENT_RULE_OBJECTS
message.locale: - Rule object data found that was consistent with database data:

message.name: INF_INCONSISTENT_RULE_OBJECTS
message.locale: - Rule object data found that was inconsistent with database data:

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECTS_UPDATED_COUNT
message.locale: - Rule objects checked for updates: %1n

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECTS_CREATED_COUNT
message.locale: - Rule objects created: %1n

message.name: INF_RULE_OBJECTS_REMOVED_COUNT
message.locale: - Rule objects removed: %1n

message.name: INF_ATTRIBUTE_VALUES_CHANGED_COUNT
message.locale: - Attribute values changed: %1n

message.name: INF_ATTRIBUTE_VALUES_UNCHANGED_COUNT
message.locale: - Attribute values unchanged: %1n

message.name: INF_INCONSISTENCIES_FOUND
message.locale: Full propagation detected and corrected data inconsistencies in rule objects.

message.name: INF_INCONSISTENCIES_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Full propagation did not detect any inconsistencies in rule objects.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_RULE_CLASS_CONTAINS_INITIALIZATION_ARGUMENTS
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule class '%2s' contains initialization arguments.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_RULE_CLASS_ABSTRACT
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule class '%2s' is abstract.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_RULE_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule set '%2s' does not contain rule class '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule set '%2s' not found.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_MISSING_ATTRIBUTE
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': no '%2s' attribute set for element '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_EVIDENCE_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': no evidence name found in evidence map for type code '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_RULE_CLASS_MUST_EXTEND
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule class '%2s' must ultimately inherit from rule class '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_ENTITY_MUST_HAVE_SINGLE_FIELD_KEY
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': database table '%2s' does not have a single-field key.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_ENTITY_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': database table '%2s' does not have any entity metadata.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_STATUS_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': database table '%2s' does not contain a status column named '%3s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_ENTITY_KEY_NOT_MAPPED
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule class '%2s' does not contain a '%3s' attribute to match the primary key of table '%4s'.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_MULTIPLE_PROPAGATION_SOURCE
message.locale: Error in configuration for rule object propagator type '%1c': rule class '%2s' is targeted by more than one source of data: '%3s'

message.name: WARN_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_INCONSISTENT_SUCCESSION_SET_VALUES
message.locale: Values for '%1s' are inconsistent: %2s - the latest value will be used. Either the rule attribute has been modeled incorrectly or the differences in succession set values could indicate an evidence design issue.

Values for '%1s' are inconsistent: %2s - the latest value will be used. Either the rule attribute has been modelled incorrectly or the differences in succession set values could indicate an evidence design issue.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_NONPROPAGATABLEOPERATION_DETECTED_NO_RULE_CLASSES
message.locale: It is not possible to reliably propagate the database rows affected by operation '%1s' on entity '%2s' of stereotype '%3s', with key values '%4s' and details values '%5s'. This data will not propagate to any rule objects.

message.name: ERR_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_NONPROPAGATABLEOPERATION_DETECTED_RULE_CLASSES
message.locale: It is not possible to reliably propagate the database rows affected by operation '%1s' on entity '%2s' of stereotype '%3s', with key values '%4s' and details values '%5s'. This data will not propagate to rule objects for rule class(es) '%6s'.

message.name: WARN_RULE_OBJECT_PROPAGATORS_NONPROPAGATABLEOPERATION_RUNFULLPROPAGATION
message.locale: (To correct this problem, arrange to run full rule object propagation.)

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SEARCH_NOT_SUPPORTED
message.locale: Searching of evidence by attribute '%1s' is not supported.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_RULE_OBJECTS_FOUND_FOR_ENTITY
message.locale: Multiple rule objects found for entity '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_RULE_OBJECTS_FOUND_FOR_CORRECTION_SET
message.locale: Multiple rule objects found for correction set with ID '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_RULE_OBJECTS_FOUND_FOR_SUCCESSION_SET
message.locale: Multiple rule objects found for succesion set with ID '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_UNHANDLED_MATCH_VALUE
message.locale: Unhandled match value '%1s'.

message.name: INF_CONVERTER_CREATING_RULE_OBJECT_FOR_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: Converter creating rule object for rule class '%1s'.

message.name: INF_PROPAGATOR_OUT_OF_SYNC
message.locale: Rule object propagator config with snapshot ID '%1n' and name '%2s' is out of sync.

message.name: INF_PROPAGATOR_ALREADY_QUEUED_FOR_PUBLISH
message.locale: Rule object propagator config with snapshot ID '%1n' is already queued for publication.

message.name: INF_SYNCHRONISING_PROPAGATOR
message.locale: Rule object propagator config with snapshot ID '%1n' is being synchronised.
